metadata.title: CVE-2025-0237 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: The WebChannel API, which is used to transport various information acrossprocesses, did not check the sending principal but rather accepted theprincipal being sent. This could have led to privilege escalation attacks.This vulnerability affects Firefox < 134 and Firefox ESR < 128.6.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs78 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
